languages.text:
"...Но клич заглушен был ревом суровым стихии.
Чары, со снегом вихрящимся в танце сплетясь,
Двух лишь оставили зверю
Кровавой поживой".

"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."
languages.original_text:
"...Но клич заглушен был ревом суровым стихии.
Чары, со снегом вихрящимся в танце сплетясь,
Двух лишь оставили зверю
Кровавой поживой".

traits.locale_text:
"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

"...But the cry was drowned out by the roar of the harsh elements.
The enchantments, with snow whirling in a dance intertwined,
Two only left the beast
Bloody reap."

"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

languages.text:
「…しかしその叫びは
荒れくれる天候の咆哮にかき消された。
雪が渦巻く魔法のなか
絡み合う踊りにて
獣が2人に残したのは
血まみれの名残
だけであった」
languages.original_text:
"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

traits.locale_text:
「…しかしその叫びは
荒れくれる天候の咆哮にかき消された。
雪が渦巻く魔法のなか
絡み合う踊りにて
獣が2人に残したのは
血まみれの名残
だけであった」

languages.text:
“…但那凄厉的呼喊，
被狂风暴雪的咆哮所淹没。
魔法伴随着飘落的雪花，
交织而舞。
转眼之间，
只留下最后两只，
染血的野兽。”
languages.original_text:
"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

traits.locale_text:
“…但那凄厉的呼喊，
被狂风暴雪的咆哮所淹没。
魔法伴随着飘落的雪花，
交织而舞。
转眼之间，
只留下最后两只，
染血的野兽。”

languages.text:
« Mais le cri fut étouffé
par la fureur des éléments.
Dans la danse des flocons,
il ne restait plus à la bête
qu'une moisson sanglante
de deux proies seulement. »
languages.original_text:
"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

traits.locale_text:
« Mais le cri fut étouffé
par la fureur des éléments.
Dans la danse des flocons,
il ne restait plus à la bête
qu'une moisson sanglante
de deux proies seulement. »

languages.text:
«... Pero el grito quedó ahogado
bajo el rugido de los elementos desatados.
Magia, entrelazada con la nieve
en un baile delirante,
pues la bestia dejó
una siega salvaje
de tan solo dos».
languages.original_text:
"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

traits.locale_text:
«... Pero el grito quedó ahogado
bajo el rugido de los elementos desatados.
Magia, entrelazada con la nieve
en un baile delirante,
pues la bestia dejó
una siega salvaje
de tan solo dos».

languages.text:
"... Doch der Schrei wurde übertönt
von den tosenden Elementen.
Magie, mit wirbelndem Schnee
in einem umschlungenen Tanz,
denn das Untier ließ
eine blutige Ernte
von zwei nur zurück."
languages.original_text:
"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

traits.locale_text:
"... Doch der Schrei wurde übertönt
von den tosenden Elementen.
Magie, mit wirbelndem Schnee
in einem umschlungenen Tanz,
denn das Untier ließ
eine blutige Ernte
von zwei nur zurück."

languages.text:
"Zor şartlar çok etkindi
Bastırıverdi feryatları.
Kar ve büyü, dans edercesine
Güçlü uğulduyor.
Öyle ki canavar,
Sadece ikisinin
Kanlı cesetlerini bıraktı."
languages.original_text:
"...But the cry was drowned out
by the harsh elements roaring.
Magic, with snow whirling
in a dance intertwining,
for the beast left
a bloody reaping
of only two."

traits.locale_text:
"Fakat feryat boğuldu
zor şartlar yüzünden.
Uğuldayan kar ve büyü,
dans edercesine bir aradaydı.
Zira canavar,
sadece ikisinin
kanlı cesedini geride bıraktı."
